abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32918548, pmid33450372, pmid33587756, pmid33566319, pmid33522795, pmid33015705, pmid33506974, pmid33502666, pmid33000172, pmid33587177
